abstract: Warren E. Buffet has built a $1 billion stake in leading reinsurer Munich Re, as the billionaire investor continues to add to his holdings reinsurance sector.
snippet: Warren E. Buffet has built a $1 billion stake in leading reinsurer Munich Re, as the billionaire investor continues to add to his holdings reinsurance sector.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett has built a $1 billion stake in the reinsurer Munich Re, as the billionaire investor continues to add to his holdings in the reinsurance sector.

headline.main: Buffett Takes Stake in Munich Re
